about_the_game:
An Epic Drama Shaped by the Threads of Fate.

A multilayered epic detective story full of moral dilemmas set in completely different times, where you can change the plot with your choices.

Take Place in a Captivating Story.

Encounter gods that mortals have forgotten existed. Journey through different centuries in pursuit of a mysterious killer. Witness a case unfold that will ultimately affect you, the people you meet along the way, and the fate of forgotten deities. Meet the figures of legend in person and play a leading role in the stories that are murmured in your ear before bedtime.

Dozens of Endings, Hundreds of Choices.

Even the smallest decision you make will affect the course of the story. No two games will be the same. Every choice you make will change the outcome of the game. The fate of Timur, those he cares for, and the gods he worships all rests with you.

Chasing the Shadow.

Investigate the murder scenes left behind by the mysterious killer and leave no detail unnoticed. Use the Echo, interact with individuals, connect clues, and piece together the broken pieces of the intricate enigma. Only you and your choices can lift the curtain of this vast mystery woven by the machinations of the gods.
